fields.request: Manual QA: Validate SendLocalList and GetLocalListVersion dispatch
fields.request_details:
1. Connect a test charge point so it shows as online in the dashboard.
2. POST to /chargers/<charger_id>/action/ with action=send_local_list and a small localAuthorizationList payload; confirm the server logs show the SendLocalList frame with the expected listVersion.
3. Confirm the charge point acknowledges the new list version and reflects the authorization list change.
4. POST to the same endpoint with action=get_local_list_version and verify the response updates the local authorization state without errors.
